Name: The Icon Battles
About the game: Turn your desktop into a battlefield! The Icon Battles is a Windows application that turns your desktop icons to life, and they endlessly fight each other. Features Exciting endless battles Styled to match the appearance of the Windows desktop An icon may stop fighting if it is too hurt. But it will be able to rush into battle again in a few minutes Ability to make an application as a screensaver Screensaver You can make this program run as a screensaver! The program turns on automatically when the computer is not used. Safety The Icon Battles does not read or edit the contents of files on the desktop. It just gets the positions, names, and images of the icons and renders them in a separate window.
